column5: Went out last week in search of the unheralded bowfin.  What a blast throwing jigs at them in shallow water.  Sight fishing is my favourite!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PrgHHY7fKm0&t=1s
Good job. Great numbers. I have only caught a few, but love the fight.
They are a blast on light tackle during the spring feed and spawn. Especially when they colour up.
